title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in India 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 7.44 was reached at Year 2021,  2022, and 2023
Minimum GDP growth rate compared to previous year about 6.12 was reached at Year 2019
